p: The participants were divided into three groups by random allocation software (RAS/ version 1.0.0, M Saghaei, Isfahan, Iran) [ 31] through randomized blocks of three and six with an allocation ratio of 1:1:1 by a person who was not involved in the study. For allocation concealment, according to sequence generation opaque and sealed envelopes numbered from 1 to 75; each contain a letter designating the allocation. The first envelope was dedicated to first participant and this process was followed to the end of the research. Only the statistician was blind to the study.
